['Specifications:Rated Voltage: 110-220VRated Power: 75WFrequency: 50-60HzWire length: About 84.6"Recommended Temperatures:For thicker hair, use 210-230°C /410-445°FFor normal hair, use 190-210°C /375-410°FFor thinner hair, use 170-200°C /340-375°FAdvantages:•Silicone keypad that is durable•360 degree rotatable wire prevents tangles•Includes digital LCD operating display screen•Brush body is made out of high-temperature resistant plastic that is designed from the United States•Ingenious combination of hair straightener and brush, with a 3 in1 function: ceramic iron straightener + detangling brush + anion hair massager•The EQOBA hair straightener\'s heated brush is healthier for your hair. Firstly, when the comb plate reaches 200 °C(392°F), the exterior is only50°C(122°F)so that you will not burn your skin. Secondly, it produces anion when in use which removes frizz and also massages your scalp. Also, anion can combine with air to produce moisture that can help nourish your hairWarnings:1. Please check the condition of the product body and cord before use; don\'t use if there is any damage2. This brush has Auto Shut-Off Protection, it will shut down automatically every half an hour, please restart it if you want to use it again.3. Keep out of reach of children4. Keep away from flammable materials5. Wait until cool before storing the product6. Highest set temperature allowed is 230°C (446°F).However, it is highly recommended that you don\'t use the maximum set temperature over a long period of time as this may damage your hair. Once you are finished using, please pullout the electric plug7. You can use it when your hair is dry or semi dryPackage Includes:1 x Hair Straightener1 x Product Instructions2 x Hair Clips']

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Focus:** The user remains primarily focused on eye care products that enhance the appearance of eyelashes while actively exploring organizational beauty items for improved storage. They continue to delve into skincare, particularly products addressing under-eye concerns, and are interested in hair styling tools.

- **Preferences:** Ease of use is a key factor across all beauty products, including skincare and organizational solutions. The user values high-performing products that effectively condition, protect, and volumize eyelashes, and appreciates revitalizing skincare options.

- **Performance Concerns:** The user is particularly sensitive to product performance and quality, especially regarding issues like flaking in eyelash enhancements. They are open to experimenting with new beauty items that offer high functionality and usability.

- **Rating Tendencies:** The user's approach to ratings remains critical, averaging around 3.0. However, they display an increased propensity to award higher ratings (such as 4.0) when products meet or exceed their usability and quality expectations, reflecting recent positive experiences.

- **Experience Expectations:** High-quality standards for all beauty and skincare items are a constant pursuit, along with a continued focus on effective storage solutions for beauty tools.

- **Timeframe Engagement:** Engaged with beauty products since 2015, the user's recent interactions indicate a broader beauty routine and a growing interest in organization and skincare.

Overall, the user combines a cautious yet exploratory mindset, seeking effective performance, ease of use, quality, and organization in their beauty regimen.
